text: visvasaya tæbuvangenda, (bohomayak dena yuddhaya gæna) yamkisi (tani) paricchedayak pahala kala yutu noveda?yi pavasannaha. esema (pæhædili ha) ek sthira vu paricchedayaka pahala karanu læba, yuddha karana men ehi pavasa tibunahot, kavurunge hrdayanhi asanipa ætteda, ovun maranasannayata pætali sihi murcha vi væti sitinnan balannak men (nabiye!) obava, ovun balanu oba dakinnehiya! ebævin movunta vinasayayi
